product_name: BIC Sport DURA-TEC Original Stand Up Paddleboard - 11' 4"
long_description: Great for a wide range of paddlers in both flatwater and small surf, this stable entry-level 11' 4" paddleboard uses durable polyethylene construction for rugged performance at a great price.
short_description: Great for a wide range of paddlers in both flatwater and small surf, this stable entry-level 11' 4" paddleboard uses durable polyethylene construction for rugged performance at a great price.
